identification.name: M1: Review
identification.desc:
You should have completed for this module :

  1. the reading assignments for this module
  2. the viewing of all videos

The review is an opportunity for you to test yourself whether you know the material. The pace will be slightly faster than the self study questions.

Note: You can watch the video as many times as you need before you attempt these self-study questions.

identification.name: M7: Video 4 / SSQ
identification.desc:
Erratum on Video:

At Time 9:33, I mention segment "ten thousand..". I meant "Segment 1010"..... The example uses segments with sequence numbers 1000, 1006, and 1010. There is no segment with a sequence number "ten thousand.."

Ideally for these self-study questions, you should perform these tasks in this order:

  1. Consult Slide #28 to know about the reading assignments.
